bio: Web3 marketing maven, driving decentralized narratives, and shaping the future of digital ecosystems.
contributionDescription:
I have extensive experience in digital strategy and marketing, and I am very interested in contributing to your project.

Although I did not directly contribute to the project beyond governance on Airdrop day, I believe my knowledge and skills can be valuable to the team. As a strategist, I can help identify opportunities and develop effective plans to achieve our goals. As a digital marketing professional, I can help increase project visibility and attract more users.

I look forward to the opportunity to work with you and contribute to the continued success of the Retropgf project.

contributionLinks.description: Marketing pro with strategic skills eager to contribute to Rede Optimism

pwFlaggedReason: The application should be flagged for violation of rule 1 - promises of future deliverables are not allowed. The applicant states their future plans on contributing to the project and what they want to achieve.
pwCategorySuggestions: Community Building, Digital Strategy, Governance & Tokens, Digital Marketing, Web3 Marketing
